RPCD.No.DIR.BC.110/07.38.01/96-97                       March 5, 1997  
All State/Central Co-operative Banks  
Dear Sir,  
Interest Rates on Deposits  
It has been brought to our notice that some banks, while soliciting deposits from the public, have 
resorted to highlighting only the compounded yield on term deposits without indicating the actual 
rate of simple interest offered by the bank for the particular period of the deposits. As this is likely 
to mislead the customers, the banks should in any  advertisement and literature soliciting deposits 
indicate the simple rate of interest per annum for the period of the deposit.  
2. The banks are advised to follow these instructions scrupulously.  
3. Please acknowledge receipt to the concerned Regional Office.  
Yours faithfully,  
Sd/- 
(Y.S.P. THORAT) 
Addl. Chief General Manager
